Title: Surekill
Plot: When a real estate agent is shot inside a prison cell by someone who apparently fired from the roof, Scully and Doggett track him to two exterminators, one of whom has x-ray vision.
GuestStars: Michael Bowen, Kellie Waymire, Patrick Kilpatrick, Joe Sabatino, Tom Jourden, Ty Upshaw, James Franco, Noel Guglielmi, Greg Boniface
